name: band-dot-rand
description: Discover a new band. Or six.

scripts.postinstall: tsc && mv -i -v src/client/frontend/public dist/ && mv -i -v package.json dist/
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix src/client/frontend && npm run build --prefix src/client/frontend

author: Gavi Schneider
